item.description:
Singles Dance and Party at The Gallery in Glastonbury

This is our nite to celebrate being single, whether you like it or not...get out, mingle, eat, drink, dance.

Our special party will have reserved tables, champagne, cake, party favors provided for us. Also a buffet dinner included. Cash bar. Dancing to DJ upstairs, live band downstairs.

Time: 6 pm, buffet is from 6:30 - 8:30 pm, ends at midnight.

Cost: $12 pp

Dress jeans OK.

A singles dance isn't so bad if you're there with your friends...

Directions from Hartford: I 84 E to Exit 55 (Rte 2). Continue Rte 2 E to Exit 8. At end of exit take Right at lite onto Hebron Ave. Take Left at next lite onto New London Turnpike. The Gallery is the second building on the Left. Park in the back. Enter at the side and pay as you enter. Look for the Meetup signs at the tables to your right!!!

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Eat-Drink-Dance, Eat-Drink-Dance- Singles Party!
